query: WITH entities AS (SELECT created_at, id FROM core_statements WHERE (COALESCE((created_at, id) < ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: StatementId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_statement_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
